note:
YAMG (yet another map geek)
#Cartonaut

You and I are animals that evolved in a universe with at least 3 dimensions plus time. We've been orienting and reorienting ever since we were single cell organisms in the ocean and in the womb. With our senses we've been mapping as long as we can remember (literally, memory is key to our ability to map) and it comes to us like breathing. I'm here to celebrate big deep gulps of fresh maps.

#map #maps #cartography #GIS #mapping #topographic

Micro Mentor and SCORE are non-profit organization offering free assistance to small business in business planning, operations, marketing and other aspects of success.
